intro.title: Professional JPG to PNG Converter & Image Format Tool

Whether you're preparing images for web design, creating graphics with transparency, or preserving lossless image quality, our tool provides perfect conversion with customizable transparency settings. Features quality control, background removal options, and compression settings - all processed securely in your browser.

faqs.question: What's the difference between JPG and PNG formats?
faqs.answer: JPG uses lossy compression that reduces file size but may lose some image quality, while PNG uses lossless compression that preserves every pixel perfectly. PNG also supports transparency, making it ideal for graphics, logos, and images that need transparent backgrounds.

faqs.question: Will converting JPG to PNG improve image quality?
faqs.answer: Converting won't recover quality already lost in the original JPG, but PNG will prevent further quality loss and preserve the current image exactly as it is. PNG is better for images with text, sharp edges, or when you need transparency support.

faqs.question: Why are PNG files larger than JPG files?
faqs.answer: PNG files are typically larger because they use lossless compression, preserving every pixel of the original image. JPG files are smaller due to lossy compression that removes some image data. The trade-off is between file size and perfect quality preservation.

faqs.question: Can I remove the background when converting JPG to PNG?
faqs.answer: Our converter can enable transparency support, but it won't automatically remove backgrounds. You'll need to use image editing software to remove backgrounds first, then convert to PNG to preserve the transparency.

faqs.question: Is there a file size limit for JPG to PNG conversion?
faqs.answer: Yes, we support JPEG files up to 10MB in size. This covers most high-resolution photos and graphics. Larger files may cause slower processing, so we recommend optimizing very large images before conversion.

faqs.question: Are my images stored on your servers during conversion?
faqs.answer: No, your privacy is completely protected. All image conversion happens directly in your browser using client-side JavaScript. Your images are never uploaded to our servers or stored anywhere. They remain completely private.

faqs.question: When should I use PNG instead of JPG?
faqs.answer: Use PNG for images with text, logos, graphics with sharp edges, images requiring transparency, screenshots, and when you need lossless quality. Use JPG for photographs and images where smaller file size is more important than perfect quality.

faqs.question: Can I convert multiple JPG files to PNG at once?
faqs.answer: Currently, you process images one at a time, but our tool maintains your settings between conversions, making it easy to process multiple images with the same quality and compression settings quickly and consistently.

intro.title: Профессиональный Конвертер JPG в PNG и Инструмент Формата Изображений
intro.content: Преобразуйте ваши JPEG изображения в PNG формат с помощью нашего продвинутого онлайн конвертера. Готовите ли вы изображения для веб-дизайна, создаете графику с прозрачностью или сохраняете качество изображений без потерь, наш инструмент обеспечивает идеальную конвертацию с настраиваемыми параметрами прозрачности. Включает контроль качества, опции удаления фона и настройки сжатия - все обрабатывается безопасно в вашем браузере.
